synopsis.text: This anime takes us to the heart of Lindworm, a harmonious town where humans and monsters live side by side. Here, young doctor Glenn specializes in treating monster girls, each with unique physiologies and appearances. From examining mermaid gills to aiding a harpy in laying eggs, Glenn's dedication to his patients often lands him in precarious yet thrilling situations. With his reliable lamia assistant, Saphentite, Glenn navigates through unconventional medical challenges, always ready to lend a hand, no matter the circumstances. But when a dubious character attempts to steal a precious harpy egg, Glenn must rise to the occasion and protect his patients. Delve into this medical fantasy that explores the extraordinary lives of monster girls and the doctor who cares for them.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
